籤詩版本二:
Yog tsis muaj txoj kev xav, tsis muaj tsev neeg, tus neeg ruam li dej ntws zoo li lub paj poob.
Yog koj thov kom koj lub siab zoo, koj yuav tsum tau ua, tab sis thaum kawg koj yuav pom tias txhua yam teeb meem
詩意:
Qhov no hexagram yog ib tug kos npe rau ntawm ib tug blockage nyob rau hauv Dao ntawm ib tug neeg ruam.
Nyob twj ywm hauv txhua yam thiab tos lub sijhawm.
解曰: Tsis txhob hais qhov raug lossis yuam kev. Yuav tsum ceev faj. Siab zoo. Kom tsis txhob muaj kev puas tsuaj.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Yin Jiao ntsib nws tus kws qhia ntawv
Yin Jiao yog tus tub ntawm King Zhou ntawm Shang Dynasty, thiab nws pe hawm Guang Chengzi ua nws tus xib fwb. Peb xyoos tom qab, nws kawm khawv koob, thaum nws nqis saum roob los, nws tau cog lus rau Guangchengzi tias nws yuav tsis pab Vajntxwv Zhou ua tej yam phem thiab yuav nrhiav chaw nkaum nrog Vajntxwv Wen.
Ntawm txoj kev, nws tau instigated mus tsev los pab King Zhou. Tus tswv mus yaum nws, thiab tus tswv thiab cov tub txib sib ntaus sib tua. Tom qab ntawd, Jiang Ziya thiab Taoist Ran Deng ntes Yin Jiao ntawm ob lub roob thiab raug shoveled los ntawm Guang Chengzi tuag. Nyob rau hauv teb rau lo lus cog tseg nws (Yin Jiao) swore.
聖意: Kuv tsis nyob hauv tsev, kuv nyob nyab xeeb, kuv thov nyiaj, kev lag luam nyuaj, nyuaj rau kev sib yuav, Kuv thov Vajtswv foom koob hmoov, tib neeg thaiv teb, muaj ntau kab kab, muaj ntau. tsiaj, muaj ntau yam kev puas tsuaj, kuv nrhiav neeg, kuv txom nyem, kuv txom nyem, kuv txom nyem, kuv txom nyem, kuv txom nyem, kuv txom nyem, kuv txom nyem hauv teeb meem.
古人: Ntsib tus kws qhia ntawv hauv Yinjiao
